casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alfonzo MEEKS. No. 248P03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of June 2006 by Defendant for "Objection to the Recommendation of the North Carolina Court of Appeals":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
